sentences.en: A faint smile of reminiscence appeared on her face..
sentences.cn: 一丝怀旧的微笑浮现在她的脸上。

sentences.en: A warble for joy of lilac - time, returning in reminiscence.
sentences.cn: 唱一支深情的歌, 为这回忆中归来的丁香花季节的欢乐.

sentences.en: And the senstive observer of sculpture must learn to feel shape simply as shape, not as description or reminiscence.
sentences.cn: 雕塑品的敏锐观赏家必须学会把形体当作形体去感觉, 而不当作描述或联想去感觉.

sentences.en: As a cross of philosophy and divine Platosophy, Plato s doctrine of reminiscence has theological form.
sentences.cn: 柏拉图的回忆说作为哲学与神学的交汇点,其形式是神学的.

sentences.en: But I can't reminiscence in the sadly night.
sentences.cn: 我却无法回忆,在这悲惨的夜里.

sentences.en: But the blind peddler was caught up with the train of his one dramatic reminiscence.
sentences.cn: 但是盲人小贩正沉浸在自己的怀旧和回忆中.

sentences.en: Generation gap, conservation, reminiscence, pedantry and stubbornness all basically derive from that.
sentences.cn: 代沟, 保守, 怀旧, 迂腐顽固,基本都源于此.

sentences.en: He entertained us with reminiscence of his childhood.
sentences.cn: 他追述他的童年时代,从而使我们高兴起来.

sentences.en: Here I am boring you with my reminiscences.
sentences.cn: 我的这些陈年老事让你烦了吧。

sentences.en: Reminiscence in practice and sensationalism in research break up the history relation of the theories.
sentences.cn: 实践中的“怀旧”和研究上的“追新”实际上割裂了理论的历史联系.

sentences.en: Reminiscence is the theme appearing frequently in Chinese poems.
sentences.cn: 怀旧是在中国诗歌中反复出现的主题.

sentences.en: The intensive nursing group consists of 34 cases , given 3 R ( Reminiscence , Reality , Remotivation ) intensive nursing.
sentences.cn: 对照组31例, 实施内科常规护理.

sentences.en: The scene awakened reminiscence of my youth.
sentences.cn: 这景象唤起了我对青年时代许多往事的追想.

sentences.en: There is a reminiscence of her mother in the way she talks.
sentences.cn: 她那讲话的神态使人联想起她的母亲.

sentences.en: Welcome to enter our theatre to experience a journey of reminiscence about the past together.
sentences.cn: 欢迎进入剧场共同经历一场怀旧之旅.

sentences.en: Why the reminiscence should evoke such a strong emotion I do not understand.
sentences.cn: 我自己也不明白,为什么会起这么深浓的情绪?

words.tran_cn: 怀旧的，回忆往事的；耽于回想的

trans.tran_en: a spoken or written story about events that you remember
